ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: http://pub3.ezboard.com/fprexus95980general.showMessage?topicID=1389.topic has a bunch of screen shots of the stats of these items :=).  Wow!
ygData.messageBody:
http://pub3.ezboard.com/fprexus95980general.showMessage?topicID=1389.topic has a bunch of screen shots of
the stats of these items :=). Wow!

Jeff Illian wrote:

> We saw a number of new items drop last night also including an AC16 -2Cha +5 just about everything else
> shadow knight/necro tunic and a AC6 Necro bracer (both purple). We also saw Mace of Ykesha drop about 4
> times, dam 10, del 22, effect Ykesha. A friend paladin got an Awesome Axe dam 32, del 40, +6 str +6 agi
> and my wife looted a rather humerous Axe, Dam 45, del 150 Barb/Troll/Ogre only off of a Mountain Giant.
> The one that I'm REALLY trying to get right now is a good friend (another bard) got a pair of AC18 bard
> only boots plus some stats that are the same color as the hero bracer out of Kunar Castle :-)
>
> Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> > I could tell ya but then I would have to kill ya and Miriana too! (just
> > kiddin!) (inside joke: her guild and mine are fiendly rivals on the same
> > server.)
> >
> > We got 3 nice swords last night that I dont think anybody else (on our
> > server) has. One is a big daddy Yk <eg>. Throneblade of Ykesha. 2HS 33 /
> > 51, str + 6, int + 6 proc: Ykesha. Another is Jade Reaver 2HS 23/40, 12 wt,
> > war/pal/shd/rng. And also a Jade Broadsword 1HS 11 / 25 str+8 sv Poison+10
> > Disease+10
